summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2788 for the improvement of Thirteenth Avenue South, from Snoqualmie Street to Lucile Street, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing watermains in said district, under Ordinance No. 33327 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
